summary: Completed comprehensive RBAC testing for PluralSkill LMS. All 16 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). All frontend RBAC tests passed - Admin sees both dashboards, Trainer sees only Trainer Dashboard, Learner sees neither dashboard.
passed_tests: Backend: API health check passed
Backend: Admin login successful with role=admin
Backend: Admin can access /api/admin/stats
Backend: Admin can access /api/trainer/courses (sees all courses)
Backend: Trainer login successful with role=trainer
Backend: Trainer can access /api/trainer/courses (sees own courses)
Backend: Trainer correctly denied access to /api/admin/stats (403)
Backend: Trainer correctly denied access to /api/admin/users (403)
Backend: Trainer can create course via /api/trainer/courses
Backend: New user signup gets learner role
Backend: Learner correctly denied access to /api/trainer/courses (403)
Backend: Learner correctly denied access to /api/admin/stats (403)
Backend: Learner can access public /api/courses
Backend: Unauthenticated user denied access to /api/admin/stats (401)
Backend: Unauthenticated user denied access to /api/trainer/courses (401)
Backend: Unauthenticated user can access public /api/courses
Frontend: Admin login shows both Trainer Dashboard and Admin Dashboard in menu
Frontend: Trainer login shows only Trainer Dashboard in menu (NOT Admin Dashboard)
Frontend: Trainer Dashboard page loads correctly at /trainer-dashboard with stats cards
Frontend: Trainer can open Create Course dialog
Frontend: Admin Dashboard page loads correctly at /admin with full analytics
Frontend: New Learner signup does NOT see Trainer Dashboard menu item
Frontend: New Learner signup does NOT see Admin Dashboard menu item
Frontend: Learner sees Profile and My Learning menu items
seed_data_creation: Used existing seeded admin and trainer users
context_for_next_testing_agent: RBAC implementation is complete and working. Backend has require_admin and require_trainer_or_admin decorators. Frontend AuthContext provides isAdmin, isTrainer, isTrainerOrAdmin flags. Navbar conditionally shows dashboard links based on role. All three roles (admin, trainer, learner) have correct access permissions.
rca_of_the_issue: N/A - No issues found. Previous iteration's GraduationCap error has been fixed.
